page.title: 17Health
page.content: There is only one{doctor}in Kenninghall, he is Dr.Tom Rayner. The nearest{hospitals}are in Norwich, which is 18 miles away or Bury St. Edmunds which is 20 miles away. We have{disrict nurses}in the area who travel around the countryside attending all those who need extra medical help and also{mid-wives}for home confinements. There is usually a welfare{clinic } every fortnight for the infants in the area and these are held at the local village halls. The nearest{dentist}is in East Harling which is about 3 miles away. In an emergency{ambulances}have to come from the larger places like Thetford or Diss, these places are 9 miles away.
